forecastday.fcttext: A good deal of sunshine. High near 55F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and some clouds. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High near 55F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 8C. Winds SE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
